formulas.name: querySericeResourcesPerson
formulas.expression: "SELECT ServiceResource.name FROM AssignedResource WHERE ServiceResource.IsPerson__c = true AND ServiceAppointmentId = '"&{!myReservationsTable.firstSelectedRow.Id}&"'"

formulas.name: queryServiceResourcesNoPerson
formulas.expression: "SELECT ServiceResource.name FROM AssignedResource WHERE ServiceResource.IsPerson__c = false AND ServiceAppointmentId = '"&{!myReservationsTable.firstSelectedRow.Id}&"'"

formulas.name: soqlCustomer2
formulas.expression: "Select id, Email__c, Phone,Availaible_Credit__c from Account where id='" + {!myReservationsTable2.firstSelectedRow.ParentRecordId} + "'"

formulas.name: soqlCustomerDetails
formulas.expression: "Select id, Email__c, Phone,Availaible_Credit__c from Account where id='" + {!myReservationsTable.firstSelectedRow.ParentRecordId} + "'"

formulas.name: soqlServiceResourceNoPerson2
formulas.expression: "SELECT ServiceResource.name FROM AssignedResource WHERE ServiceResource.IsPerson__c = false AND ServiceAppointmentId = '"&{!myReservationsTable2.firstSelectedRow.Id}&"'"

formulas.name: soqlShifts
formulas.expression: "select id, StartTime,EndTime from Shift where ServiceResourceId ='" + {!serviceResourceId} + "' and StartTime <= " + {!formulaStart} + " and EndTime > " + {!formulaStart}

formulas.name: soqlSRPerson
formulas.expression: "SELECT ServiceResource.name FROM AssignedResource WHERE ServiceResource.IsPerson__c = true AND ServiceAppointmentId = '"&{!myReservationsTable2.firstSelectedRow.Id}&"'"

fields.name: MyReservationsHeader
fields.fieldText:
{!sectionBox}

Moje Planované Tréningy

fields.name: noAppointmentsText
fields.fieldText: Momentálne nemáš žiadne naplanované tréningy

fields.name: etxtError
fields.fieldText: {!greyBox}Žial, táto rezervácia už nejde meniť, nakoľko dátum rezervácie je dnes

fields.name: appointmentDetails
fields.fieldText:
Typ: {!fetchServiceResourcesNoPerson.firstRetrievedRecord.ServiceResource.Name}


Trvanie: {!myReservationsTable.firstSelectedRow.Duration} min


Email: {!fetchCustomerDetails.firstRetrievedRecord.Email__c}


Mobil: {!fetchCustomerDetails.firstRetrievedRecord.Phone}


Moja Smena: {!fetchMyShift.firstRetrievedRecord.StartTime} - {!fetchMyShift.firstRetrievedRecord.EndTime}

fields.name: Copy_1_of_MyReservationsHeader
fields.fieldText:
{!sectionBox}

Moje Planované Tréningy

fields.name: Copy_1_of_etxtError
fields.fieldText: {!greyBox}Žial, táto rezervácia už nejde meniť, nakoľko dátum rezervácie je dnes

fields.name: Copy_1_of_appointmentDetails
fields.fieldText:
Typ: {!fetchServiceResourcesNoPerson2.firstRetrievedRecord.ServiceResource.Name}


Trvanie: {!myReservationsTable2.firstSelectedRow.Duration} min


Email: {!fetchCustomerDetails2.firstRetrievedRecord.Email__c}


Mobil: {!fetchCustomerDetails2.firstRetrievedRecord.Phone}
